title: Review a New Subcontract Agreement
description: A contract manager needs to review a new subcontract for the HVAC installer to ensure it includes all required clauses.

tasks.description: Scan the subcontract document and compare its clauses against the company's standard subcontract template.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent scans the document and identifies that the 'Indemnification' clause is missing.

tasks.description: Flag the missing clause and send a revision request to the subcontractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A notification is sent to the subcontractor requesting the addition of the missing clause.
